Html:
I see there are: WPF Toolkit themes ( Aero.NormalColor,Classic,Generic Luna.HomeStead, etc) and WPF Futures > WPF Themes (BureauBlack, BureauBlue, ExpressionDark etc). I'm wondering which would be the most supported and which people would recommend me to use. Most important for me is a theme style that will continue to be supported and updated to meet the needs of new components. 

Any advice would be much appreciated. 

Thanks,
